name: Bitcoin wallet backup print template
description:
This is a set of simple print templates to back up bitcoin wallets. You can write down the recovery phrase, creation date, software used, etc. Variations included:

  • 12 and 24-word templates
  • Letter and A4 paper sizes

The template also includes various tips and are set up to be exported as PDFs. Read more about types of bitcoin backups.


Leave a comment if you found this useful or have ideas for improvement. Check out bitcoin.design for more community resources.
